AdditionalNotes.value: Patients weighing from 7 to less than 15 kg, without concomitant efavirenz, nevirapine, nelfinavir or amprenavir.
Patients weighing from 15 kg to 40 kg, without concomitant efavirenz, nevirapine, nelfinavir or amprenavir.
Patients not receiving concomitant efavirenz, nevirapine, nelfinavir or amprenavir.
Patients weighing from 7 to less than 15 kg, with concomitant efavirenz, nevirapine, nelfinavir or amprenavir.
Patients weighing from 15 kg to 45 kg, with concomitant efavirenz, nevirapine, nelfinavir or amprenavir.
Patients receiving concomitant efavirenz, nevirapine, nelfinavir or amprenavir.
